methods.generated_comment:
/**
 * Sets up the panels for data entry and interaction in the GUI.
 * This method initializes various components such as buttons, labels, text fields, checkboxes, and choice menus.
 * It also configures the layout of these components within panels and attaches them to the main frame.
 * 
 * @param caption the caption for the main action button
 * @param pens the type of pension selected
 * @param stanza the room object for which the data is being entered
 * @param caller the caller identifier for differentiating actions
 */
void setupPanels(String caption, String pens, String stanza, char caller) {
    // Method body as described above
}
*/

/**
 * Initializes the object by adding an ActionListener to the "Annulla" button. When the button is clicked, 
 * it disposes of the current window and enables the parent window. 
 * 
 * @param None
 * @return None
 */

/**
 * Disposes of the current window and enables the parent window.
 * 
 * @param e the ActionEvent that triggered the method
 * 
 * This method disposes of the current window and enables the parent window. 
 * It is typically used as an ActionListener for a button click event. 
 * There is no return value as the method does not return anything.
 */

/**
 * Writes the data of a booking into the text fields of a form.
 * 
 * @param pren the booking object containing the data to be displayed
 * 
 * This method populates the text fields with the data from the provided booking object. 
 * It sets the state of two checkboxes based on the booking information. 
 * If the caller is not equal to 1, it displays the number of persons. 
 * If the booking was made through an agency, it displays the agency name and sets the state of a checkbox.
 */

/**
 * This method checks for errors in the input fields of a form.
 * It verifies if the number of people in a room is valid, if the length of the room number, last name, first name, and phone number are within limits,
 * and if the last name, first name, and phone number fields are not empty.
 * 
 * @return true if there are errors in the input fields, false otherwise
 */

/**
 * This method clears all the text fields in the testo array.
 * 
 * @param none
 * @return void
 * 
 * The cleanFields method sets the text of each text field in the testo array to an empty string.
 * This effectively clears all the text fields, making them ready for new input.
 */

/**
 * Creates a list of reservations based on the input provided by the user.
 * Retrieves reservations from the database using the specified parameters and populates a list with the results.
 * If reservations are found, the list is displayed on the screen. If no reservations are found, a message dialog is shown.
 * If there are any issues with the database connection, an error message is displayed.
 * 
 * @param testo1 the first parameter used to search for reservations in the database
 * @param testo2 the second parameter used to search for reservations in the database
 */

/**
 * Updates the availability of a room based on a booking status.
 * 
 * @param prenotazione The booking to be updated
 * @param tipo The type of availability change (DISPONIBILE for available, ASSEGNATA for assigned, BLOCCATA for blocked, COMMISSIONATA for commissioned)
 * 
 * This method retrieves the availability of a room from the database, updates it according to the booking status, and then saves the changes back to the database.
 * If there are any issues with reading the availability from the database, a message dialog will be displayed.
 */

constructors.signature: public MascheraPrenotazione(Stanza, String, String, String, String, int, char)

generated_class_comment:
/**
 * The MascheraPrenotazione class represents a graphical user interface for managing reservations.
 * It provides methods for setting up panels with data entry fields, buttons, labels, checkboxes, and choice menus.
 * The class includes functionality for reading reservation data, writing data to form fields, checking for input errors,
 * clearing text fields, creating a list of reservations based on user input, and updating room availability based on booking status.
 * 
 * This class contains constructors for initializing the reservation window with specific parameters and setting up the panels for data entry.
 * It also includes methods for handling button actions, reading and writing reservation data, and updating room availability.
 * 
 * The main functionalities of this class are:
 * - Setting up panels for data entry and interaction in the GUI
 * - Initializing the object and enabling/disabling windows
 * - Reading input data from a form and creating a new reservation object
 * - Writing reservation data into form fields and checkboxes
 * - Checking for errors in input fields and displaying error messages
 * - Clearing all text fields in the form
 * - Creating a list of reservations based on user input and displaying the results
 * - Updating room availability based on booking status
 * 
 * This class encapsulates the functionality required for managing reservations in a hotel booking system.
 */
**/
